author: rhuijben
msg: _find_serf): Remove unneeded usage of class variables. Tweak whitespace.

author: rhs
msg: Bounded messenger's credit allocation when an unlimited value is passed to recv; added tests for pushback at both messenger and engine level; fixed proton-j engine to respect credit window; fixed java messenger to properly report if work has been done. This addresses PROTON-350 and PROTON-351.

author: rhuijben
msg: In the windows project generator: Handle Cyrus sasl as a proper dependency
instead of local patches to the generator.
Handle sasl as a standard dependency, instead of by using sasl knowledge.
(get_win_defines): Detect sasl by checking libraries collection.
get_win_lib_dirs): Don't add sasl include dir to all projects, but handle
